review_blob: This beer is incredibly variable. In the bottle it can be adequate to poor, depending on how old it is. The review above is for that average bottle. From the tap also varies. A fresh keg is absolutely amazing it tastes almost like spicy beer with fresh orange.
Wow this is good. I love SNPA, but the added hop and alcohol really puts this on top. My favorite IPA.
Absolutely fantastic beer. Alcoholic, but with a sweet aroma and taste. Raisins soaked in dark rum would be a good deScriptor. I would love to have this from a N2 tap
A basic lager beer in the value market space. It tastes better than TNT and is maltier than molson or labatt blue.
